subject: Automobile Racing
Nascar Sprint Cup Series
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: After a clutch performance propelled him to the second round of the Nascar Sprint Cup playoff, Harvick has become the driver to beat for the 2015 title.
snippet: After a clutch performance propelled him to the second round of the Nascar Sprint Cup playoff, Harvick has become the driver to beat for the 2015 title.
